DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Trial Randomization Notification Received Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator of whether notification was received for randomization on clinical trial.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Clinical Trial Randomization Notification Received Indicator
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes._The allocation of individuals to groups by chance, especially in order to control the variables in an experiment.:Informing by words._An indication as to whether the entity was received.
